data.title: Kentucky Jersey Numbers
data.text:
Note: This list is not only incomplete but incorrect as well. It does not take into account the fact that many players changed jersey numbers through the course of their career. Also, at one time player's jersey numbers differed between home and away games (often due to an league rule which stipulated even numbered jerseys at home and odd numbered jerseys away) among other irregularities. Accounting for these issues would require a modification to the database and better informational resources, such as access to the original scorecards for the game. Addressing these problems may come with time, but there is no great priorty on this at the present time. - JPS

* Indicates a retired jersey honor
